First of all enter the Event details - Enter the type of the event for ex. Seminars , conferences , Parties ,etc. 

Then enter The Beginning Date of the Event strictly in the Format mm/dd/yyyy and then enter the End Date of the Event in the format mm/dd/yyyy. 

Then enter the personal details of the Person - First of all enter the mobile number without country code . 

Then enter the valid Email address of the person. 

Then enter the serving frequency which means the number of time you want the food to be served each day for example '2' if you want Lunch as well as Dinner . Enter serving frequency as '3' if you want breakFast , Lunch and Dinner . Enter '4' if you want BreakFast , Lunch , Snacks and Dinner . 

After entering all the details coorectly , Press the submit button and it will take you to the new Activity which will display the QR Code generated based on the given details . Press the EMAIL Button to send the given QR code through Email. Press the MESSAGE button to send the QR Code through MMS.


To Scan the generated QR Codes Press the Scan QR button present in the bottom navigation bar . Now Put the QR Code in the given camera frame to scan it automatically. To turn on flaslight , press on the flashlight icon given on the frame of the QR Code Scanner. To focus on the QR Code , press on the focus icon. If the given QR Code is valid and satisfies all the requirements , then the TEXTVIEW given below the camera frame will display 'Entry Permitted' . If it doest not satisfies the requirments , then it will display 'Entry Denied' . 

 Now if you have any issue then Mail us or Right SMS or Whatsapp us, press on the Help/About Us button given in the bottom navigation bar and their youb will find how to use this app and the details like the developers Contact Details.
